Row.Text: Begin your Cycle of Power

Begin your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power by choosing one of the [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER] Powers below. Each Power has its own way of generating [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue, which decays each turn. If your Virtue reaches 0, your Power will collapse and you will enter into a period of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy for 2 turns, after which time a new Power will be established and your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle will continue.
Are you sure you want to begin your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power with the [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER]Power of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Desc}[ENDCOLOR]?
Order has been restored and your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power continues with [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Desc}[ENDCOLOR]:[NEWLINE]{2_Desc}
Your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power begins with [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Desc}[ENDCOLOR]:[NEWLINE]{2_Desc}
Your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power continues with [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Desc}[ENDCOLOR]:[NEWLINE]{2_Desc}

[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue of your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER] Cycle Power has been lost and [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy has broken out![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]During Anarchy, you will not gain any [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, or [ICON_PEACE] Faith, and cities have no [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to build anything.[ENDCOLOR]
BEGIN YOUR CYCLE OF POWER
Begin your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power by choosing from one of the three available [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER] Powers.
No Cycle Power
Your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER] Cycle Power is [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Desc}[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_Desc}

{TXT_KEY_TP_ANARCHY}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power will continue after [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy has ended, establishing a new [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER] Power in place of your previous one.
[ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue: {1_Desc}{2_Num} ({3_Num})

Your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue decays at a rate [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn[ENDCOLOR], plus an additional [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn per excess [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness[ENDCOLOR]. If your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue reaches 0, your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power will be break and you will enter into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy, after which a new Power will be established in place of your previous one.

Your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue decays at a rate [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn[ENDCOLOR], plus an additional [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn per 2 Population in the Capital[ENDCOLOR]. If your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue reaches 0, your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power will be break and you will enter into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy, after which a new Power will be established in place of your previous one.

Your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue decays at a rate [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn[ENDCOLOR], plus an additional [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn per City[ENDCOLOR]. If your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue reaches 0, your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power will be break and you will enter into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy, after which a new Power will be established in place of your previous one.

Your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue decays at a rate [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn[ENDCOLOR], plus an additional [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn per 10 Population[ENDCOLOR]. If your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue reaches 0, your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power will be break and you will enter into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy, after which a new Power will be established in place of your previous one.

Your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue decays at a rate [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn[ENDCOLOR], plus an additional [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 per turn per City NOT following your Religion[ENDCOLOR]. If your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue reaches 0, your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power will be break and you will enter into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy, after which your previous Power will be re-established. [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]If this occurs, you will permanently lose your Theocracy.[ENDCOLOR]
{TXT_KEY_INFO_PANEL_JFD_VIRTUE_TT_CYCLE_POWER_JFD_THEOCRACY}
{TXT_KEY_INFO_PANEL_JFD_VIRTUE_TT_CYCLE_POWER_JFD_THEOCRACY}
{TXT_KEY_INFO_PANEL_JFD_VIRTUE_TT_CYCLE_POWER_JFD_THEOCRACY}
Anarchy Begins!
The [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue of your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER] Cycle Power has been lost and [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy has broken out!
Anarchy Impending!
Your current [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER] Cycle Power is going to be overthrown in [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]{1_Num} Turns[ENDCOLOR] if you do not improve your [ICON_JFD_VIRTUE] Virtue!
Begin your Cycle of Power
You can begin your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power.
Cycle of Power Begins!
Your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power has begun with the Power of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Desc}[ENDCOLOR].
Cycle of Power Enhanced!
Your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power has been enhanced with the Power of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Theocracy[ENDCOLOR].
Cycle of Power Continues!
Order has been restored and your [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power continues with [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Desc}[ENDCOLOR].
{1_CivName} {1: plural 1?has; 2?have;} begun their [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power with the Power of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Desc}[ENDCOLOR].
{1_Desc}'s [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_POWER] Cycle Power has become a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Desc}[ENDCOLOR].
After a period of Anarchy, {1_CivName} {1: plural 1?has; 2?have;} continued their [ICON_JFD_CYCLE_OF_POWER] Cycle of Power with [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Desc}[ENDCOLOR].

Replace.Text: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your civilization is in Anarchy for {1_Turns} more turn(s). During Anarchy, you will not gain any [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, or [ICON_PEACE] Faith, and cities have no [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to build anything.[ENDCOLOR]
